description:
Nadeko Sengoku is asked by Kuchinawa, a snake deity, to find his object of worship. Nadeko accepts and goes to junior high school during the day with Kuchinawa, who turned himself into a guise resembling a white scrunchie, while searching the town at night for the object of worship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 囮物語 なでこメドゥーサ 其ノ貳
